::::Checksum { rawFrame index }

################################################################# Procedure Name: Checksum Description: calculate the 2 bytes checksum number Input args: rawFame - the string of the frame index - the start index to repace by the checksum number Output args: none Typical usage: Category Types (SetupSwitch,GetSwitchInfo,SendTraffic,CaptureTraffic, SetupTestTool,VerifySwitchOutput,Utility,VerifyTraffic) Category: Utility #################################################################

::::GetICMPv6Checksum { args }

################################################################# Procedure Name: GetICMPv6Checksum Description: return the 2 bytes checksum number: 1's complement of the sum of the 1's complement Input args: args Output args: none Typical usage: GetICMPv6Checksum $args Category Types (SetupSwitch,GetSwitchInfo,SendTraffic,CaptureTraffic, SetupTestTool,VerifySwitchOutput,Utility,VerifyTraffic) Category: Utility #################################################################
